thread.section_title: Logo Influx Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Logo Influx | logoinflux.com
thread.title: Kara Pittman Jackson
thread.title_full: Logo Influx reviewed by Kara Pittman Jackson

author: Kara Pittman Jackson
title: Kara Pittman Jackson
text: I was sitting at my computer lost for at least the past three weeks.I was not sure what to do with the small business I plan to open to include my logo and a website. I found Logo Influx on the internet and within a few days we have my logo on the go and my website almost right! I am very glad I contacted this company and spoke with Jacob. He helped me make the decisions to best suite me and my future small business! He was very polite and very patient with me.
